name: Russian VAZ Driver Simulator 2016 full
description:
Please try out our new game for android – Vaz Driving Simulator!

Vaz Driving Simulator is a game designed to appeal to both casual racing fans and hardcore simulator lovers!

Welcome to severe russian roads! It’s getting hot in here, the race is about to start! Your goal is to race through a city while avoiding obstacles along the way.

**HOW TO PLAY** Tap the gas pedal to start up. Use the arrow keys to control your vehicle. Tap the brake pedal to stop the vehicle.

Game features:
+ russian driving sim
+ urban landscapes
+ original car models
+ realistic gameplay

Enjoy a fantabulous driving experience with Vaz Driving Simulator! Become a real Russian car driver!
